Description:
Detects a curl process start on linux, which indicates a file download from a remote location or a simple web request to a remote server

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Curl Usage on Linux
Query: sourcetype like 'linux-%' eql select * from _source_ where process_path like '%/curl'
